text: Jesse Leonard Steinfeld (6 January 1927 - 5 August 2014) was an American physician and public health official. He was appointed the eleventh Surgeon General of the United States from 1969 to 1973. Steinfeld died on 5 August 2014 from complications from a stroke in Pomona, California, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Surgeon Generals of the United States Category:Politicians from Pittsburgh Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Jesse Leonard Steinfeld
